common_issues.title: Copilot Not Responding with Code Suggestions
common_issues.description: Users report Copilot continuously loading without generating code suggestions. This issue occurs on the desktop application (macOS) and involves Pieces Copilot failing to provide responses, sometimes displaying an error message. The support team is aware and investigating the problem.

related_issues.text:
Copilot is not giving any feedback
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

Pieces for Developers 3.3.3

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The copilot is not generating anything, it just keeps on loading.
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key points:**

* User @gittydia reported an issue with Pieces Copilot responding with "I'm sorry. Something went wrong with processing. Please..." 
* The issue was automatically triaged by the support bot and assigned to the relevant team member.
* The bot suggested related issues and helpful resources to the user while the team investigates the issue.

**Problems identified:**

* Pieces Copilot is unable to provide proper responses in some cases, leading to user frustration.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* The support bot has routed the issue to the appropriate team member for investigation and resolution.

**Current status/outcome:**

* The team is currently working on fixing the issue. 
* No further updates are available in the conversation excerpt.

recommendations: Investigate and address the root cause of the "Copilot Not Responding with Code Suggestions" issue, as it's impacting users on macOS desktop applications, specifically the Pieces Copilot module.
Monitor the performance and stability of the Pieces Copilot module to proactively identify and resolve future issues.
Consider providing users with more informative error messages or troubleshooting steps when Copilot fails to generate suggestions.
Review and update support resources (e.g., FAQs, documentation) to address the "Copilot Not Responding" issue and provide users with self-help options.
